languages.text: Ксеносы намеревались уничтожить ключевые узлы в техническом отсеке с помощью направленного взрыва — необходимо срочно вывести аппарат из строя.

traits.locale_text: Ксеносы намеревались уничтожить ключевые узлы в техническом отсеке с помощью направленного взрыва — необходимо срочно вывести аппарат из строя.

languages.text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.
languages.original_text: Ксеносы намеревались уничтожить ключевые узлы в техническом отсеке с помощью направленного взрыва — необходимо срочно вывести аппарат из строя.

traits.locale_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a directed explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed post haste.
The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.
The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

languages.text: Les xénos comptaient détruire les modules principaux de la baie de maintenance à l'aide d'une explosion ciblée. L'engin explosif doit être désamorcé immédiatement.
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: Les xénos comptaient détruire les modules principaux de la baie de maintenance à l'aide d'une explosion ciblée. L'engin explosif doit être désamorcé immédiatement.

languages.text: 异形打算通过定点爆炸，摧毁维修甲板的关键节点，需要立刻解除他们的爆炸装置。
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: 异形打算通过定点爆炸，摧毁维修甲板的关键节点，需要立刻解除他们的爆炸装置。

languages.text: 異種族は、メンテナンスベイの主要なノードを狙って爆破し、破壊するつもりだった。爆発装置を直ちに解除する必要がある。
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: 異種族は、メンテナンスベイの主要なノードを狙って爆破し、破壊するつもりだった。爆発装置を直ちに解除する必要がある。

languages.text: Die Xenos hatten vor, die wichtigsten Knotenpunkte in der Wartungsbucht durch eine gezielte Explosion zu zerstören. Der Sprengsatz muss unverzüglich entschärft werden.
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: Die Xenos hatten vor, die wichtigsten Knotenpunkte in der Wartungsbucht durch eine gezielte Explosion zu zerstören. Der Sprengsatz muss unverzüglich entschärft werden.

languages.text: Los xenos tenían intención de destruir los nodos clave de la bahía de mantenimiento con una explosión precisa. Hay que desactivar su artefacto explosivo de inmediato.
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: Los xenos tenían intención de destruir los nodos clave de la bahía de mantenimiento con una explosión precisa. Hay que desactivar su artefacto explosivo de inmediato.

languages.text: Zenolar, hedefe yönelik bir patlama ile bakım güvertesindeki kilit öneme sahip devreleri yok etmeyi planlıyor. Patlayıcı cihaz, derhâl etkisiz hâle getirilmeli.
languages.original_text: The xenos were planning to destroy the key nodes in the maintenance bay with a targeted explosion. The explosive device needs to be disarmed immediately.

traits.locale_text: Zenolar, hedefe yönelik bir patlama ile bakım güvertesindeki kilit önem taşıyan devreleri yok etmeyi planlıyorlarmış. Patlayıcı cihaz derhâl etkisiz hâle getirilmeli.
